programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer leads us to the heart of South America to explore the Amazon River Islands. Life on these islands benefit from the Amazon and Orinoco Rivers, as well as the rich rainforest that dominates the North East region of South America. From high flying squirrel monkeys to slow moving sloths, we will explore what makes the Amazon River Islands such a fascinating region of the Earth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us to the peak of South America to the Andes Mountains. The tumultuous weather and treacherous heights have caused many unusual animals to form specialized behaviors in order to survive. We’ll explore what life is like for the descendants of the Incans, as well as the animals who call the Andes Mountains home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us back to the Philippines where we will find some of the most fascinating wildlife in the animal kingdom. We’ll head to the mangrove forests where people still call home and use the rivers and streams as a means of transportation, food, and fun. We will also head to the trees where macaques play, and where tree nymphs turn into beautiful butterflies.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we head back to South America to explore some of our favorite animals. We’ll start in Venezuela where the Orinoco River provides a home for people and animals – such as pumas, egrets, and crocodiles. We’ll also head to the Amazon Rain Forest where life is bursting at every turn. From red howler monkeys to harpy eagles, the Amazon Rain Forest provides us with some of the most fascinating animals on Earth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we venture back to some of our favorite islands from around the world. We start in South America, home to the Amazon River Islands that are full of wildlife. From red howlers to squirrel monkeys, the trees on these islands are full of furry creatures. We’ll then head to South East Asia where the Philippines are full of unbelievable insects. We’ll even get a firsthand look at a tree nymph becoming a butterfly, but its new life gets off to a sticky start.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we head to Asia and visit the highest peaks in the world, the Himalayas. We’ll see everything from the migration of cranes to the daily life of snow leopards. The climate and landscape of these mountains are anything but convenient, so we’ll explore what it takes to call the Himalayas home.

programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: Dragonquest
programme.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet -- the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S2 E7 | The Ladykillers
programme.desc: Rose Swartwood, an elderly woman living alone in a New York project, is stabbed to death late one night in a frenzied attack. For the next two years the case remains unsolved. Though police have a prime suspect in a thug named Demetrious Moore, they lack evidence to tie him to the case.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S2 E8 | The Wrong Man
programme.desc: Memphis Police have a prime suspect in the gruesome killings of two prostitutes. But as they prepare to make an arrest, psychic Carol Pate pays the cops a visit. “He’s not the killer,” she says. “You’re looking at the wrong man.”

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S2 E9 | Homestead Horror
programme.desc: Someone is attacking the elderly female residents of the depressed mill town of Homestead, Pennsylvania. Over the past four years, five women have been raped and assaulted in their own homes.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S2 E10 | Bad Company
programme.desc: A Vancouver area nightclub owner disappears into thin air. Police believe he’s fled the city, traveling incognito under one of his many known aliases.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S2 E11 | Staunton Stalker
programme.desc: The college town of Staunton, Virginia is being terrorized by a stocking-masked, knife-wielding serial rapist.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S2 E12 | Tunnel Vision
programme.desc: Two teenage girls are killed horribly, months apart, on the outskirts of the northern Canadian city of Thunder Bay. Despite the best efforts of police investigators, the case goes unsolved for two years.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Invasions
programme.desc: How will the world confront an alien invasion will depend a lot on the visitors. Meet our potential galactic neighbors.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Adventures
programme.desc: Brave new worlds and amazing locales await in the new wild frontier of outer space adventures. What will you explore?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E8 | Monopoly Men
programme.desc: Thought by many to be a government organization maintained to provide financial accountability in the event of a domestic depression, the actual business of the FED is shrouded in secrecy.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E9 | Lost Lightning: The Missing Secrets of Nikola Tesla
programme.desc: At the end of the 19th century, a race was on to power the world. Caught in the crossfire was inventor Nikola Tesla, who claimed he could provide everyone with free, unlimited energy. Was it true?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E10 | Tunguska: The Russian Roswell
programme.desc: Just prior to the Russian Revolution, a mysterious explosion occurred in the desolate northlands of Siberia. Was it an asteroid? Or could it have been the explosion of an extraterrestrial craft?

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S2 E7 | Australia 1: Henbury Craters
programme.desc: Geoff and Steve journey to one of the most remarkable meteorite sites on the planet—the Henbury Crater field in central Australia.

programme.title: Street
programme.desc: A young fighter has to choose between honor and glory, or becoming a cage fighter for the Russian Mafia.

programme.title: Chariots of the Gods
programme.desc: Based on the book by Erich Von Daniken, could the ancient mysteries of the world been influenced by extra-terrestrial visitations?

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Teacher
programme.desc: A night school teacher and an alien beast rampage in a toe-to-toe battle.

programme.title: CATHY'S CURSE
programme.desc: A young girl is possessed by the spirit of her aunt, who died as a child in a car accident.

programme.title: Ellipse
programme.desc: A man and his dog are stranded on a volatile planet and are forced to adapt and escape.

programme.title: Siege
programme.desc: When vigilantes massacre patrons of a gay bar, the sole survivor seeks refuge in a nearby apartment building.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: When a young mastiff, Bodi (Luke Wilson), discovers a radio, it takes just a few guitar licks for his fate to be sealed: Bodi wants to be a rock 'n' roll star!

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: Born with a snout, Penelope must find true love in order to break the curse. Her controlling parents line up potential husbands, but Penelope just wants to see the world, and ultimately it is her first real adventure that leads her to romance.

programme.title: Broken Promises
programme.desc: A man becomes obsessed with his former girlfriend after he is released from prison.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman soon realizes someone is breaking into her house and spying on her.

programme.title: Back in the Day
programme.desc: Sometimes in order to move forward, you have to go back. Jim Owens does just that when he heads home for his high school reunion, attempts to relive the glory days with his boys and explore an old romance... and nearly burns it all down.

programme.title: Black Water: Abyss
programme.desc: When a tropical storm hits and flood waters rise, a group of friends find themselves trapped deep in a cave with killer crocodiles.

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: A submarine captain and his supply officer are determined to get their dry-dock sub back into WWII action. However, a bevy of nurses comes aboard, causing hijinks in the hot pink sub.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: George Eastman is a poor young man determined to win a place in society and the heart of a beautiful socialite (Elizabeth Taylor). Shelley Winters plays the factory girl whose dark secret threatens Eastman’s professional and romantic prospects.

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Rose Hill
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, four young, New York City street kids save an abandoned baby girl and move to Montana to start a new life. Stars Jennifer Garner. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Smooch
programme.desc: Suffering from amnesia, a prince becomes a nanny to a little girl and falls in love with her single mother. Stars Kellie Martin, Kiernan Shipka, and Simon Kassianides.

programme.title: Smart Cookies
programme.desc: A high-maintenance realtor forced to do community service must lead a group of hopeless girl scouts in the regional cookie drive competition.

programme.title: Fairfield Road
programme.desc: Noah McManus finds out his new boss in Washington is a corrupt Senator who can no longer employ him and that his girlfriend has been cheating on him. Devastated, Noah travels to a quaint Cape Cod town.

programme.title: To Dance with the White Dog
programme.desc: An unusual love story in which a strange white dog appears and helps Sam Peek, a Georgia tree farmer, cope with the loss of his wife, Cora. Stars Hume Cronyn and Jessica Tandy. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Lake Mungo
programme.desc: Strange things start happening after a girl is found drowned in a lake.

programme.title: Bait
programme.desc: A freak tsunami traps a group of people inside a supermarket, and soon they find they are not alone.

programme.title: The Reeds
programme.desc: A boating party turns into a nightmare when a group stumbles upon a terrifying secret hidden in the reeds.

programme.title: Lake Mungo
programme.desc: Strange things start happening after a girl is found drowned in a lake.

programme.title: According to Greta
programme.desc: A suicidal and rebellious teen is sent to her grandparents for the summer where life takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Tells the intriguing and highly seductive story behind one of Vermeer’s greatest and most enigmatic paintings.

programme.title: Riverworld
programme.desc: An astronaut and his motley crew of allies battle for the souls of humanity in Riverworld, an Earth-like afterlife where people from every era have been reborn young and healthy.

programme.title: Retrograde
programme.desc: Two opposing time travelers are sent back to the present to prevent a global biological disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Flowers for Algernon
programme.desc: Charlie Gordon (Matthew Modine) is mentally handicapped but wants to be a genius. When a laboratory experiment raises his IQ to amazing levels, Charlie must emotionally adjust to his new abilities.

programme.title: Steel Frontier
programme.desc: A story of a gunfighter who goes after a band of marauders that is terrorizing and killing indiscriminately.

programme.title: At First Light
programme.desc: After an encounter with mysterious orbs leaves her with extraordinary powers, a young woman becomes engulfed in first contact with an alien species.

programme.title: Wargames (1983)
programme.desc: The fate of mankind rests in the hands of a teenager (Matthew Broderick) who accidentally taps into the Defense Department's tactical computer. Dabney Coleman and Ally Sheedy co-star.

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: When five teens discover a machine that can send them back in time, the possibilities seem endless. But by changing the past, they have threatened the future of our world. Can they undo the damage they have unleashed before it’s too late?

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In this tense apocalyptic thriller, five youths fight to survive after being stranded in Moscow during an alien attack.

programme.title: Blood and Chocolate
programme.desc: The story takes place in modern-day Bucharest and tells the tale of nineteen-year-old Vivian Gandillon, who has spent her life on the run from the truth that she is a werewolf.

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: A girl (Jennifer Connelly) must solve a dangerous labyrinth and rescue her brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King (David Bowie).

programme.title: Avenging Angelo
programme.desc: A woman discovers she is the daughter of a murdered mafia chieftain and seeks revenge with the aid of her father's faithful bodyguard (Academy Award nominee Sylvester Stallone, "Rocky").

programme.title: Avalanche!
programme.desc: A father and his children face certain death after an avalanche - caused by a suspicious plane crash - entombs them in their remote mountain cabin with a dangerous smuggler (David Hasselhoff, "Baywatch").

programme.title: Firepower
programme.desc: Two undercover cops risk it all by going deep inside a federally sanctioned haven of gambling, prostitution, drugs and violence, to bring down a psychotic criminal mastermind.

programme.title: The Assassin's Code
programme.desc: A rookie detective, son of a late disgraced cop, works to solve his first major case while under the watchful eye of a ghost-like assassin.

programme.title: Battle of Kings: Bannockburn
programme.desc: This graphic docu-drama tells the story of the pivotal campaign of Scotland's King Robert the Bruce against King Edward II of England, culminating in the Battle of Bannockburn in 1314.

programme.title: The Untold History Of The United States: The Bomb
programme.desc: The strategies behind the US atomic bombings of Japan are explored as well as the new mythology that emerged from the war. The bombing haunted the Soviets and mistrust towards the Allies grew quickly.

programme.title: The Imposter
programme.desc: When a grieving family's son returns after three years, they're elated and immediately take him back in. But not all is as it seems as Nicholas Barclays' story becomes more and more inaccurate. Winner of the BAFTA for Best Documentary, from the producers of Three Identical Strangers.

programme.title: Being Evel
programme.desc: Academy Award-winning filmmaker Daniel Junge and producer Johnny Knoxville examine the life, career, and legacy of Evel Knievel, the man from Montana who stared death in the face to become a legendary daredevil and heroic icon.

programme.title: Finding Noah
programme.desc: Follow a group of intrepid explorers as they climb and live atop a 17,000 ft mountain in Turkey to determine the final resting place of Noah's Ark. Narrated by Gary Sinise ("Forrest Gump").

programme.title: Ghostheads
programme.desc: A look at the intense fandom that developed around the movie/cultural phenomenon “Ghostbusters.”

programme.title: Wait for Love
programme.desc: Best friends, Alex and Zory, find themselves both in chaotic relationships, accepting what they think is love. What begins as unhealthy, soon turns deadly.

programme.title: Her Happy Place
programme.desc: Tasha lost her job and her boyfriend. Even worse, she lost the love for herself. Her friend Felicia helps her time travel to find when she lost her self love hoping they can get it back.

programme.title: You People
programme.desc: You People is a satirical comedy about modern stereotypes, chronicling the life of an intelligent, white-washed, African American college student, adopted by a liberal Caucasian family, who has a crisis of identity while growing up in the Bible belt, white suburbia with his urban hip-hop culture obsessed, white best friend. When an attractive girl on campus approaches the black protagonist based on his 'presumed' stereotypical traits, he has to undergo a 'cultural transformation' with the help of his white companion to tap into his inner 'blackness.'

programme.title: Noxious
programme.desc: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Georgia unfold as the reckless Kennedy discovers her lovers darkest secrets.

programme.title: Let Go & Let God
programme.desc: Let Go and Let God follows two people from vastly different worlds whose lives are rocked after experiencing sudden deaths in their family. They question God as a result, but find the faith they're looking for on an unexpected path.

programme.title: Home Of The Brave
programme.desc: The lives of two young men collide in an unexpected way. A young war veteran returns home eager to rejoin his brother and two close friends at the after-school program they started to help kids in their community. While working to make their dreams of expanding the program and impacting their community a reality they are faced with challenges that could put their program at risk. A young cop makes efforts to connect with the people in the community as one of the good guys. Confident that he's prepared for anything, he jumps right in to protect and serve but it doesn't take long for the young officer to realize that maybe he's not as prepared as he thought. The stories of these two men unfold as we witness their paths cross and their lives changed because of it.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 1
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 2
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Food Choices
programme.desc: Join award-winning filmmaker Michal Siewierski on his three-year journey to expose the truth about our food choices. This ground-breaking documentary explores the impact that food choices have on people's health, the health of our planet and on the lives of other living species. And also discusses several misconceptions about food and diet, offering a unique new perspective on these issues. Featuring interviews with 28 world-renowned experts, including Dr. T Colin Campbell, Joe Cross, Dr. John McDougall, Capitan Paul Watson, Dr. Michael Greger, Rich Roll, Dr. Richard Oppenlander, Dr Toni Bark and several others. This film will certainly change the way you look at the food on your plate.

programme.title: The Redeemed and the Dominant: Fittest on Earth
programme.desc: elite athletes take on a series of grueling tests to vie for the title of 'Fittest on earth.' Follow the drama as they endure the unknown and unknowable during four of the most intense days of competition in CrossFit Games history.

programme.title: Froning: The Fittest Man in History
programme.desc: Rich Froning Jr. is a legend in CrossFit and the Sport of Fitness. In this biopic, take a look at his childhood, follow his quest for a fourth CrossFit Games title, and see him as a son, a husband and a new father.

programme.title: The Fittest
programme.desc: In 2019 the CrossFit Games consisted of dramatic changes to the season, and final competition. Can the top male and female athletes find their way in this new format to be crowned, the Fittest on earth

programme.title: Fittest on Earth 2015
programme.desc: The fittest athletes on earth take on the CrossFit Games, the ultimate test of fitness, to prove they are the fittest on earth.

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: When his wife refuses to pay his ransom, an abducted mobster takes over from his kidnappers and shows them how it's done.

programme.desc: A bachelor talks his assistant into posing as his wife so he can avoid marrying his girlfriend.
